name: Ancient Warlords: Aequilibrium
description: Ancient Warlords: Aequilibrium is a trading card game, taking place in the world of the Late Antiquity. Unite the best of Roman, Chinese, Persian and Indian warriors under your command.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
